fuzzy_new_dir: Select NEW Translation Folder (to apply suggestions)

pipeline_rpyc_not_found_reason1: The game was distributed with only .rpy source files
pipeline_rpyc_not_found_reason3: The game has never been run
pipeline_rpyc_solution: Run the game once (you can close it after main menu appears). Ren'Py will automatically create .rpyc files.
pipeline_rpyc_alternative: Disable 'RPYC Reader' option in Settings. Translation will use only .rpy files.
pipeline_files_not_found_parse: Translation files not found or failed to parse

no_texts_reselect_hint: If you still see "No texts found" after UnRen, click Browse and re-select the project folder so RenLocalizer refreshes the files.
auto_save_question: Would you like to save translations automatically?
auto_save_error_message: Could not auto-save translations: {error}\nUse 'Save Translations' button for manual save.
glossary_save_error: An error occurred while saving the glossary: {error}
about_content:
RenLocalizer V2

Advanced multi-engine translation tool for Ren'Py games.

Features:

  • Multi-engine translation support
  • Automatic proxy rotation
  • Batch processing
  • Modern user interface
  • UTF-8 Ren'Py format output

Version: {version}

Framework: {framework}

¬© {year} {team}
text_types_description: Select which text types should be included for translation. Default settings work well for most projects.
translate_ui_tooltip: Screen text() elements and general UI strings
translate_input_tooltip: input default, prefix and suffix values
translate_alt_text_tooltip: imagebutton, hotspot and hotbar alt texts (accessibility)
translate_define_tooltip: Texts defined with define statements (use with caution)
enable_deep_scan_tooltip: Scans for hidden strings that normal patterns miss (init python blocks, dictionaries, variable assignments). May include false positives.
enable_rpyc_reader_tooltip: Reads compiled .rpyc files directly via AST extraction, no decompilation needed. Finds strings that may be missed by regex patterns.
translate_renpy_func_tooltip: Texts in renpy.input() and similar functions
glossary_info: Define preferred translations for frequently used terms here. This glossary is applied on translation output.
glossary_extract_no_project: Please select a project folder on the home page first.
glossary_translate_confirm:
{count} empty terms will be translated via Google Translate. This may take a moment.
Continue?
glossary_copy_confirm:
{count} empty terms will be filled with source text.
These terms will be protected (kept as is) during translation.
Continue?
theme_tooltip: Application color theme - Dark or Eye-friendly
auto_save_tooltip: Automatically save settings to config.json when changed
auto_save_translations_tooltip: Automatically save translation files when completed
check_updates_tooltip: Check for new versions when application starts
update_available_message:
A new version is available: {latest} (current: {current}).
Open the releases page?
unren_auto_download_tooltip: Automatically download UnRen from GitHub when needed
unren_custom_path_tooltip: Custom folder containing UnRen files (leave empty for default)
max_threads_tooltip: Number of concurrent translation threads (8-64 recommended)
max_batch_tooltip: Number of texts processed at once (100-500 recommended)
request_delay_tooltip: Delay between requests - helps avoid rate limiting
max_retries_tooltip: Maximum retry attempts for failed translations
timeout_tooltip: Maximum wait time for a translation request
multi_endpoint_tooltip: Sends parallel requests to multiple Google Translate servers, uses fastest response
lingva_fallback_tooltip: Try free Lingva service if Google fails (no API key required)
endpoint_concurrency_tooltip: Number of parallel endpoint requests (8-16 recommended)
enable_proxy_tooltip: Use proxy for translation requests - helps bypass IP blocks
auto_rotate_tooltip: Use different proxy for each request - better distribution
test_startup_tooltip: Test proxy connections when application starts
update_interval_tooltip: How often to refresh the proxy list (seconds)
max_failures_tooltip: Maximum errors before a proxy is disabled
manual_proxies_note: Enter one proxy address per line (host:port format):
log_level_tooltip: Detail level for logs - DEBUG is most detailed, ERROR is least
max_log_size_tooltip: Maximum log file size - old entries removed when exceeded
chunk_size_tooltip: Memory chunk size used when processing large files
debug_mode_tooltip: Show extra debugging information for developers
verbose_logging_tooltip: Log all operations in detail - useful for troubleshooting
language_restart: Please restart the application for changes to take full effect.
app_theme_desc: Change interface colors (independent of Windows settings)
app_theme_desc_dark: Dark theme is active (independent of Windows settings)
theme_restart: Please restart the application for the theme to be fully applied.
restore_confirm: All settings will be reset to defaults. Are you sure?
defaults_restored: Settings restored to defaults. Please restart the application.

unren_mode_dialog.title: Choose How to Run UnRen
unren_mode_dialog.description: Select the workflow that best matches your experience level.

automatic.title: Automatic Mode
details: Captures console output inside the application log

manual.title: Manual Mode
details: Opens the classic UnRen console window
You can chain advanced options (3-6, a-l, registry helpers, etc.)

unren_mode_dialog.manual_hint: Automatic mode is experimental; it may not behave as expected and menus might stay open. Manual mode is recommended. See Help ‚Üí Info ‚Üí UnRen for detailed instructions.

formats.title: Translation File Formats
formats.description: RenLocalizer V2 supports two output formats for Ren'Py translation files:

simple.title: üü¶ SIMPLE Format (Default)
simple.recommended_for: Modern projects, manual editing, clean output

old_new.title: üü© OLD_NEW Format (Official)
old_new.example:
translate en hello_world:
    old "Hello, world!"
    new "Hello, world!"
old_new.recommended_for: Legacy projects, official tools, maximum compatibility

formats.note: Both formats work perfectly in Ren'Py engine. The difference is only in syntax style and readability.
formats.change_setting: You can change the output format in Settings ‚Üí General ‚Üí Output Format.

multi_endpoint.title: üöÄ Multi-Endpoint Google Translator (v2.1.0)
multi_endpoint.description: The new translation architecture introduced in v2.1.0 sends parallel requests to multiple Google servers, increasing translation speed by 2-3x.

how_it_works.title: How It Works
steps: Each slice sends parallel requests to 3 different Google endpoints
First successful response is accepted, others are cancelled
If all Google endpoints fail, Lingva fallback kicks in

items.name: Use Multi-Endpoint
items.description: Sends parallel requests to multiple Google servers. If disabled, a single endpoint is used sequentially.

items.name: Lingva Fallback
items.description: If all Google endpoints fail, Lingva Translate kicks in. Lingva is free and requires no API key.

items.name: Parallel Requests
items.description: How many slices are processed simultaneously. 16 is ideal for most systems. Reduce to 8 for slow internet.

items.name: Max Chars per Request
items.description: Maximum characters in a slice. Larger values mean fewer HTTP requests but a single error affects the entire slice.

performance.title: Performance Comparison
performance.note: Actual performance depends on internet speed, server response time, and text complexity.

tips.title: Tips
items: If you get rate limit errors, reduce Parallel Requests to 8
For very long texts, reduce Max Chars per Request to 8000
Lingva can be slow sometimes - you can disable Lingva Fallback for urgent jobs
If using proxy, it works together with Multi-Endpoint

text_types.title: Text Type Filters
text_types.description: RenLocalizer V2 distinguishes between different text types in Ren'Py projects and allows you to select which types to include in translation.

items.name: Dialogues
items.description: Character dialogues and narrator texts. Forms the main story content of the game.

items.name: Menu Options
items.description: Options in player choice menus. Critical texts where players determine the story flow.

items.name: Buttons
items.description: textbutton and similar screen elements. Clickable elements in the game interface.

items.name: UI Texts
items.description: Screen text() elements and general interface strings.

items.name: Input Fields
items.description: Default, prefix and suffix values of input elements.

items.name: Alt Texts
items.description: Accessibility alt texts for imagebutton, hotspot and hotbar elements.

items.name: Notifications
items.description: Instant messages shown via Notify() actions and renpy.notify() calls.

items.name: Confirmation Dialogs
items.description: Confirmation windows shown via Confirm() actions and renpy.confirm() calls.
items.example: Confirm("Are you sure you want to quit?")

items.name: Config Strings
items.description: Texts defined in config.* variables (game name, version, etc.).

items.name: GUI Strings
items.description: Interface texts defined in gui.* variables.

items.name: Define Strings
items.description: General texts defined with define statements. Use with caution - some may contain code.

items.name: Ren'Py Functions
items.description: Texts in renpy.input() and similar functions.

tips.title: Usage Tips
items: Default settings work well for most projects - only change when needed.
Use Define Strings carefully - they may contain variable names or code fragments.
Alt Text translation is important for accessibility - for players using screen readers.
Config and GUI strings are typically found in options.rpy and gui.rpy files.
If you disable a text type, those texts will not be included in the output file.

text_types.note: Text type filters can be configured in Settings ‚Üí Text Types tab.

performance.title: Performance Settings Guide
performance.description: Critical settings to optimize system performance:

parser_workers.title: Parser Workers
parser_workers.description: Number of worker threads used to process files in parallel.
parser_workers.note: Setting more than your CPU core count will decrease performance.

concurrent_threads.title: Concurrent Threads
concurrent_threads.description: Number of threads running simultaneously during translation.
concurrent_threads.note: Very high values may cause rate limit issues.

batch_size.title: Batch Size
batch_size.description: Number of translation requests to process at once.
batch_size.note: Larger batch sizes are faster but use more memory.

request_delay.title: Request Delay
request_delay.note: Very low values may cause you to hit API limits.

features.title: Program Features
features.description: Advanced features offered by RenLocalizer V2:

current.title: üöÄ Multi-Endpoint Google (v2.1.0)
current.description: Parallel requests to multiple Google servers for 2-3x faster translation

current.title: üîç Deep String Scanner (Experimental)
current.description: Scans for hidden strings in init python blocks, dictionaries, and variable assignments that normal patterns miss

current.title: üì¶ RPYC Reader (Experimental)
current.description: Reads compiled .rpyc files directly via AST extraction - no decompilation needed to find hidden strings

current.title: üéØ Smart Pattern Recognition
current.description: 40+ regex patterns to extract dialogues, menus, UI elements, notifications, and more

current.title: üîÑ Variable Protection
current.description: Safely preserves [player], {b}, {color} and similar tags during translation

current.title: ‚ö° Parallel Processing
current.description: Process multiple files simultaneously with async workers

current.title: üìö Glossary System
current.description: Define preferred translations for frequently used terms

current.title: üåê Translation Engines
current.description: Google Translate (free, multi-endpoint) and DeepL (API key required)

current.title: üîß UnRen Integration
current.description: Built-in UnRen support to extract .rpa and decompile .rpyc files

current.title: üîç Health Check (v2.4.0)
current.description: Static analysis to detect unwrapped strings, placeholder mismatches, syntax errors before translation

current.title: üî§ Font Helper (v2.4.0)
current.description: Check if game fonts support target language characters - prevents ‚ñ°‚ñ°‚ñ° issues

current.title: üß™ Pseudo-Localization (v2.4.0)
current.description: Test UI bounds and font compatibility with [!!! markers !!!] and √†cc√©nts without real translation

current.title: üîÑ Fuzzy Matching (v2.4.0)
current.description: Recover translations when source scripts change slightly using smart similarity matching

current.title: üìù Translation Memory (v2.4.0)
current.description: Built-in common UI strings for 8+ languages to ensure consistency

current.title: üóÇÔ∏è Context Viewer (v2.4.0)
current.description: See WHERE each string appears (dialogue, menu, screen, button) to disambiguate identical strings

upcoming.title: üé® Text Types UI
upcoming.description: Visual interface for selecting which text types to translate

new_tools_v240.title: New Tools (v2.4.0)
new_tools_v240.description: RenLocalizer v2.4.0 introduces powerful new analysis and testing tools:

tools.name: üîç Health Check
tools.description: Static analysis for detecting common localization issues before translation.
features: Detects UI strings not wrapped in _()
tools.usage: Select Tools ‚Üí Health Check and choose a game directory to scan.

tools.name: üî§ Font Compatibility
tools.description: Verifies if game fonts support target language characters.
features: 15+ language character sets (CJK, Cyrillic, Arabic, etc.)
tools.usage: Select Tools ‚Üí Font Compatibility, choose directory, then check against your target language.

tools.name: üß™ Pseudo-Localization
tools.description: Test UI without real translation - reveals layout and font issues instantly.
features: No API calls - instant local transformation
Three modes: expand, accent, or both
tools.usage: Select 'üß™ Pseudo-Localization (Test)' from Translation Engine, then start translation.

tools.name: üîÑ Smart Update (Fuzzy)
tools.description: Recover translations when source scripts change slightly between versions.
features: Human review for lower similarity matches
Translation Memory with common UI strings
Full CLI support for batch operations
tools.usage: Use CLI: python run_cli.py fuzzy old_tl/ new_tl/ --threshold 0.9

unren.title: UnRen Integration Guide
unren.description: RenLocalizer downloads and caches UnRen before analysis. Automatic mode is still experimental, so watch the log output and switch to manual if something stalls:

versions.title: Which UnRen build should I launch?
versions.description: The first two menu entries point to different Python runtimes. Match the option to the Ren'Py version used by the game:

options.title: UnRen-current.bat
options.description: Python 3-based release for modern Ren'Py builds. Handles the archive layout used by 7.4+ and Ren'Py 8 projects.
options.note: Check game/renpy/common/version.txt or the splash screen‚Äîif it shows 7.4 or any 8.x/Py3 build, pick this option.

options.title: UnRen-legacy.bat
options.description: Classic Python 2 toolchain that matches older games and 32-bit distributions.
options.note: Choose this when the game launches with a Py2 runtime, ships only a 32-bit exe, or when UnRen-current.bat fails with compatibility errors.

automatic.title: Automatic Mode (experimental)
points: Runs menu options 1 + 2 (extract RPA, decompile RPYC) sequentially with safe defaults
Streams live output to the Logs tab; if you see a pending prompt, cancel and continue in manual mode
If the console refuses to close, stop the UnRen task and finish manually‚Äîalready extracted data stays intact

manual.title: Manual Mode
points: Opens the UnRen console so you can chain advanced menu blocks (3-6, a-l, registry helpers)
Ideal when enabling developer tools, bypassing protection, or injecting mods
Great fallback when automatic mode hangs because you can see the exact menu step
manual.warning: Incorrect menu choices can permanently modify the project‚Äîskip steps you don't fully understand.

checklist.title: Pre-flight Checklist
items: Make sure the selected folder contains the game/ directory at its root.
Back up the project or work on a copy before modifying any assets.
Ensure antivirus/SmartScreen is not blocking UnRen-current.bat.
Free disk space should be roughly 2√ó the combined size of the .rpa archives.

manual_flow.title: Manual Mode Flow

steps.title: 1) Download and verify
steps.detail: Note the path shown in the download-complete message; use Help ‚Üí UnRen ‚Üí Download again if you need fresh files.

steps.title: 2) Launch manual mode
steps.detail: Confirm the path printed on the first console line points to the game root (folder that contains game/).

steps.title: 3) Option 1 ‚Äì Extract RPAs
steps.detail: Wait until every .rpa archive finishes; capture the console output if any error appears.

steps.title: 4) Option 2 ‚Äì Decompile RPYC
steps.detail: Allow UnRen to overwrite .rpyc files; keep the window open until you see the final 'Done' message.

steps.title: 5) Optional extras
steps.detail: Use options 3-6 or a-l if you need developer tools, protection bypass, or additional mod helpers.

steps.title: 6) Keep the console open
steps.detail: If you notice more archives, rerun the commands in the same session; close the window only when you're finished.

manual_flow.note: If something fails, don't close the window immediately‚Äîgrab a screenshot so the output isn't lost, then retry the step.

verification.title: Post-run Verification
items: You should see fresh .rpy files under game/; rerun step 2 if only .rpyc files remain.
Leave the original .rpa archives in place so repeated runs can compare against them.
Running 'Scan Files' inside RenLocalizer should no longer show the ‚ÄúRPYC/RPA missing‚Äù warning.
logs/unren_auto.log (when present) shows exactly where the last automatic session ended‚Äîreview new error lines.

tips: Always run UnRen from the game root; picking a subfolder will extract nothing.
Back up .rpy files before allowing any overwrite/delete prompts.
Feel free to switch to manual mode if automatic mode stalls; previously extracted files are preserved.
Right-click the console title bar ‚Üí Edit ‚Üí Mark to copy long sections of output.

items.resolution: Verify you have write access to the game folder and that antivirus isn't blocking the .bat file. Launch cmd as Administrator and run UnRen-current.bat manually if needed.
Check the Logs tab; if you see prompts like 'Press any key', cancel automatic mode and rerun the same options manually.

items.issue: Extracted files are missing inside RenLocalizer
items.resolution: Confirm Settings ‚Üí General ‚Üí Project Directory points to the game root, then click Scan Files again‚Äîoutputs sometimes land in a parallel subfolder.

unren.footer: Review docs/external/UnRen-current.bat to inspect every prompt and default choice.

pipeline_logs.target_lang_default: Target language could not be detected; using 'turkish'

pipeline_logs.unren_error_but_rpy_found: Error occurred but .rpy files exist, continuing

pipeline_logs.scanning_sdk_dirs: Scanning installed Ren'Py SDK 'common' directories: {count} SDKs found

pipeline_logs.no_translatable_texts: No translatable texts found in source files
pipeline_logs.technical_entries_skipped: Skipped {count} technical entries when creating strings.rpy

app_description: RenLocalizer is a professional Ren'Py game translation tool with integrated UnRen support, multiple translation engines, and smart batch processing.
batch_size_desc: Number of texts to translate at once
google_api_desc: Free web version doesn't require API key
deepl_api_desc: High quality translation requires API key
show_debug_engines_desc: Show debug/test engines like Pseudo-Localization in the main list
debug_engines_changed: List updated: Developer engines are now selectable.
restore_defaults_desc: Reset all settings to default values
support_description: If you like RenLocalizer, you can support us on Patreon. Your support helps us develop new features and maintain the project.
feature_unren: Integrated UnRen support - automatically extracts .rpa and .rpyc files
feature_google: Google Translate - Free, fast, 100+ language support
feature_deepl: DeepL API - High quality translations (requires API key)
feature_batch: Smart batch processing - Fast and efficient translation
unren_desc: Use UnRen to extract .rpa archives and .rpyc files from Ren'Py games.
diagnostics_desc: Diagnostics and verification tools to improve translation quality.
feature_not_available: This feature is not yet available.
pseudo_engine_hint: Pseudo-Localization can be selected as a 'Translation Engine' on the Home page.
fuzzy_engine_hint: Fuzzy Matching engine is active in the background. Check logs for detailed report.
